additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water (Aqua)*, Potassium Cocoate*, Potassium Olivate*, Cocamidopropyl Betaine*, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil*, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin) Peel Oil*, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Virgin Coconut) Oil**, Polysorbate 80*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil**, Fragrance, Olea Europaea (Australian Olive) Fruit Oil**, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Oil**, Glycerin*, Tocopherol (Natural Vitamin E)*, Sodium Chloride (Salt)*, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate* * Naturally Derived ** Certified Organic

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Discontinue use if any irritation occurs
